main.name: Troy Clarke
main.bio: An innovative IT Developer with over 15 years expertise in the development of solutions utilizing SQL, .NET, web technologies and Microsoft Dynamics. Strong background in application development, project life cycle and client interaction.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to drop me a line.

resume.skillmessage: Proficiency levels of the following skillsets:

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: SQL and Web development, Data integrations.
highlights: Created a mobile app for appointment bookings using Xamarin (XAML), C# and SQLite.
Built data integrations in Dynamics GP 2013 to correct inventory costs and order pricing, using SmartConnect and MSSQL.
Developed data migrations/integrations to consolidate sales data for 4 newly acquired companies, from QuickBooks (ver.15) to Dynamics CRM 2013 using Scribe, SSIS, SQL.
Provided technical support, development and training for data integrations that tracked customer, leads and sales order information, using Scribe, SQL and Dynamics GP.

work.title: Sr. Programming Consultant
work.description: Microsoft Certified Business Solutions Partner (Formerly Tectura)
highlights: Developed and implemented business solutions for MS Dynamics GP/CRM using Visual Studio.NET (C#, VB and ASP), Dexterity and SQL.

Built extensive data migrations and integrations responsible for the import and export of thousands of rows of data, amounting to millions of dollars, using integration tools such as Scribe, eConnect, SmartConnect and Integration Manager for the GP and CRM platforms.

education.description: Curriculum covered: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Java, C++, C#.Net, PHP, ASP.Net, SQL, Photoshop and Illustrator

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
